attributes.action: MORE WOMEN IN TOP JOBS. WE WILL POLICE PEDOPHILES
attributes.additional_details:
More women need to be in top jobs, in traditionally male environments. If there was a fair mix of male and female in the BBC, Government, and other top (male) roles. Women would NOT allow pedophiles
to go un checked. STOP MEN KEEPING WOMEN OUT. The only reason they do it is because they know WOMEN wouldnt allow it!
Why doesnt the church want women as bishops ?
